net.jforum.entities

Class PollChanges

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jforum.entities.PollChanges

  • public class PollChanges
extends Object
    An helper class that holds changes made to the pool.
    Author:
    Rafael Steil

    • Constructor Detail

      • PollChanges

        public PollChanges(Poll first,
           Poll second)
        Parameters:
        first - The "complete", most recent poll version. Usually the one that's in the database.
        second - The poll to compare with. It usually will be a poll filled by PostCommon.fillPostFromRequest(), so matches will be done againts the existing poll and the data comming from the server.
